description: rectangular bank; metal folds secure together at short ends; caged hippopotamus whose face and backside can be seen on opposite long sides; a knob at the front slides a panel sticking the hippo's tongue out, trigger mechanism closes it; keyed door at right side
inscription:
Inscription

left side center, in red on a white sign: [BEWARE! (underlined) / MONEY EATING HIPPOPOTAMUS]
title: "Money-Eating Hippopotamus" mechanical bank
